question: Companies use a variety of methods to improve the sales of their products.What are those methods? Which is the most effective method?
text: A Firm totally depends upon its sales which help them to progress with time or remain in the market. For this companies try to opt for different kinds of methods which help them in increasing the sales of their products. Although corporations do use a variety of ways to achieve it and keep their focus on the main mean which helps the most for an increase in their goods outgoing. This essay will not only focus on mentioning the kinds but also, explain the most effective of all on which the company relays a lot.

Firstly, for any company that comes into a market, the initial thing they do is try to stand strong and meet their competition. For this, businesses go for different strategies.  For instance, using a word of mouth ( in which face-to-face interaction is necessary), gift boxes ( providing bonus things along with a product) and marketing ( it only requires digital format). Moreover, mostly these are generally used by every company. Therefore, firms usually keep these kinds in their circle for gaining more trade.

Secondly, firms do overall apply the same approach but let's explore the most effective method which is considered the backbone for gaining more product sales. Take an example, research in 2021 by John. P shows that "marketing" has been the most effective way of increasing product outgoing. Furthermore, firms try to go along with it in various different patterns so that they can get the best out of it. Hence, which ultimately help the companies to boost their out-flow of good.

In conclusion, generally, various features are considered for the better outgoing of goods by businesses but the majority keep their focus on one mean which  end up to better the sales of the products.
